```{r, echo = FALSE}
times_seven <- function(x){
  stopifnot(is.numeric(x))
  
  if(x == 7){
    print("I love sevens!")
  }
  return(x*7)
}
```

*Sneak Preview* What happens when you run this?

```{r, eval = FALSE}
my_vec <- c(7, 8, 9)

times_seven(my_vec)
```


What about this?

```{r, eval = FALSE}
times_seven(mtcars)
```
